metadata.title: Temporary Butterfly Tattoos – Party Pack – 25 Sheets!
features: Butterfly Utopia has been expertly framing butterflies since 2001!
description: 25 Sheets of Tattoos, a total of 125 tattoos featuring 25 REAL butterfly species, this is what they look like in real life! Each tattoo is about 1.75 inches wide. These are very high quality, with rich colors that will last for days (depends on your skin). FREE SHIPPING via priority mail. Click “Butterfly Utopia” above to see our other butterfly listings. These 5 star tattoo reviews can be found under our “Feedback Rating”:
”Really beautiful tattoos. Very crisp design and deep colors. They also stay on far longer than others I have used. An excellent product. “
”OMG I love these! They go on so easily and last a long time with vibrant colors. What a great price too! “
”Came very quickly and were a huge hit with the group that used them.”

”These accurately depicted butterfly tattoos are absolutely beautiful and they came very fast! I was a little late ordering but crossed my fingers and they arrived in time for my child's butterfly themed class party. These were a big hit. Thank you so much! “
”These are fun, not permanent tattoos. The butterflies are varied and most are beautiful. I enjoy using them. “
”These are wonderful - really beautiful and detailed.”
”Great tattoos. Quite beautiful. My daughter loves these things.”
”Arrived well ahead of time promised - wonderful temporary tattoo - would definitely use vendor again.”
”These are just fun. I didn't want the real thing, but wanted to play. The butterflies are very pretty.”
”Beautiful! They look real and are very detailed.”
